name: Zirnitran
movement: 30 ft. on the ground, 80 ft. in flight
description: The Zirnitran is a huge celestial being with phenomenal durability and striking luminous features, resonating with an otherworldly presence.
memorable: Its ability to frighten and blind foes with Glimpse from the Heavens creates a powerful and intimidating battlefield presence.
goals: To uphold balance and justice, often intervening in conflicts or aiding those in need.
relations: Typically associated with other celestial beings or guardians.
environment: Often found in ethereal realms, celestial planes, or places of great spiritual significance.
strengths: Possesses powerful magical attacks, numerous resistances, and several abilities that enhance its combat efficacy.
weaknesses: Can be caught off-guard by certain conditions which may compromise its abilities.
attacks: Utilizes Anointed Claws for melee strikes and Draconic Blasts for ranged attacks, both enhanced with radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Glimpse from the Heavens, which can frighten and blind enemies in a wide radius.
senses: Has truesight up to 120 feet and a passive Perception of 23.
skills: Excels in perception checks due to high Wisdom and Intelligence scores.
additional_information: Angelic Weapons deal additional radiant damage on hits.
Legendary Resistance allows it to ignore failed saves three times per day.
Immortal Nature means it doesn't need sustenance or rest.
spellcasting: Can cast various spells at will and as actions without material components, showcasing its divine magic proficiency.
